stimulusHtml: Which of the following is the most likely explanation for the way in which the artist chose to portray Empress Maria Theresa?

features.html:
Engraving by an unknown artist of Empress Maria Theresa of Austria accepting the homage of the Hungarian nobility, 1741

© De Agostini Picture Library / A. Dagli Orti/Bridgeman Images

choicesHtml: The artist wished to show her as an absolutist ruler of her diverse empire.
The artist wished to question the fitness of women to rule as monarchs.
The artist wished to stress Neoclassical ideals of public participation and citizenship.
The artist was primarily influenced by Mannerist techniques emphasizing distortion to create dramatic effects.
